name: You are over the daily limit for sending tweets

content.html: a reminder that companies do not love you, do not appreciate you, and do not care about you. they will drop you the moment it's the thing that *they* think will benefit them - regardless of whether or not that's the reality of the situation.
content.value:
a reminder that companies do not love you, do not appreciate you, and do not care about you.

they will drop you the moment it's the thing that *they* think will benefit them - regardless of whether or not that's the reality of the situation.
